name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior ML Engineer (Speech Synthesis) with 8 years of experience, I excel in Machine Learning applications, particularly in Speech Synthesis, Voice Cloning, and ASR. My technical expertise includes **Python**, **PyTorch**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Ray**, **Kubeflow**, **MLflow**, and **Weights & Biases**, allowing me to lead projects in multilingual modeling and LLM-based approaches effectively. I have a proven track record in building high-performance solutions in various sectors, especially healthcare and finance, integrating advanced AI/ML capabilities for real-time data processing and intelligent automation.
Additionally, I possess a strong background in developing robust microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, ensuring applications meet compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My experience includes designing machine learning pipelines and deploying ML models in production while leveraging tools like **Kafka**, **Redis**, **PostgreSQL**, **Parquet**, **ONNX**, and **TensorRT**.
